metadata.name: Buzz #4
metadata.description:
The metamorphosis from cult object to pioneer of a new era is complete. The VW Bus legend becomes the first all-electric icon of our time. The exclusive ID. Buzz NFT Edition combines adventures on unknown routes and digital paths. Ready to be discovered. Let's revive familiar emotions and continue writing stories, starting with the "Buzz into adventure" collection.

The entitlement to the physical product additions from the "Buzz into adventure" package is now over. The token no longer entitles you to physical collaboration products.

[Terms & Conditions](https://www.amag.ch/en/promotion/vwnf/id-buzz-nft-gtc.html)
